
h1. Search documents in Content Browser


There are many documents in a specific location so it is difficult to find a document in it. This function is used to support users to search a document in that specific location.
To search a document, do the followings:
- Go to *Content Browser*
- Config for Content Browser
- Click the
!icon1!
 icon on the toolbar to show the search form


!form1.gif!


- Select the search type in a combo box.
* With the type 'Content', it will be found in the content of documents
* With the type 'Category', it will be found in the name of folders or the name of categories
- Fill the keyword of the documents that you want to find.
- Click on the *Search now* icon to display all results of searching.


!form2.gif!
